name: KILL FOR SATAN - Thy Kingdom Undone... [Ltd.CD/500]
description:
Black Thrash Assault!! A volcanical Metal strike!! with Yuri ex ARMOURED ANGEL/PSYCHRIST on vocals and guitars!! KILL FOR SATAN spit infernal breaths with a unique and well created style, with memorable riffs, mixing Death, Thrash and Black Metal!, no limits for this Australian Metallic Beast!!!

 "Thy Kingdom Undone" it's an official worldwide reissue with a new unholy art!!

name: FERETRO - Nueva Sangre CD
description:
THE ULTIMATE Black Metal bastards from Mexico!!!

FERETRO came out from central Mexico, as four piece band with an enormous potential in their music and songs, exclaiming all hate and profanity against Christianity and offering cult to the great horned one! 

FERETRO it’s a violent display of extreme, violent and utter
Black Metal in the vein of bands like MARDUK, DARK FUNERAL etcs…
the debut album called “Nueva Sangre” (New Blood) it’s an emerging beast of black souls the entire album its sung in Spanish language, so prophanity has a radical evocation for all unholy matters
in this life!.... 7 songs of total devastation...Total Black Metal!!!

name: V.R.P.I. - Vexilla Regis Prodeunt Inferni [Ltd.CD]
description:
A Death Metal Holocaust!!

Incarnated in a beast under the name of V.R.P.I - Vexilla Regis Prodeunt Inferni ... A Satanic Dark Abortion from Mexico!!!!

In Winter 2009 a newborn beast emerged from the underground 
VEXILLA REGIS PRODEUNT INFERNI a 5 piece band project formed by: Rubens Nergal [OMINOUS CRUCIFIX], Daniel Sanchez E. [ex SARGATANAS, NECROCCULTUS] with 3 new members Christian Segovia (Guitar), Angs Biere Landran (Bass Guitar), Jesus Inukai (Guitar), after a demo the band ink a deal with Onslaught Records for the debut album under the title of Vexilla Regis Prodeunt Inferni the final chapter it’s  a great piece of Death Metal with a macabre manipulation for the interested in summoning a dark dose of obscure death metal where the haunting screams will make you tremble into your bones!
